entry.title: WIND WARNING , Victoria Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 06:16 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 8.6°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 6.9°C
Wind: WSW 24 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 except 70 gusting to 100 near Juan de Fuca Strait late this evening and overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h except west 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the morning. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
